title: PROVISIONAL
body: I won 6/10 games Finished season in bronze 3 so why do I get placed in bronze 5 riot

replies.body:
Your placement is not solely dependent on how many games out of ten you win. It depends more on the skill of your opponents and your performance in those matches.

Plus, bronze 3 to bronze 5 isn't *that* much. With a bit of grit and hard work, you'll be able to get back to bronze 3.
yea thanks bro 365 days later finally got back to silver 5
